snippet.title: Disaster Blaster - Gameplay Trailer (January 2025)
snippet.description:
Disaster Blaster is a roguelite card game where you, as a mad scientist, use a simulator to design the most destructive weapon of the universe. 🔫

Every few seconds the simulation pauses letting you refine your blaster. Add or swap cards in your sequence to create powerful combos. When the sequence ends, your blaster fires based on your choices. 

No need to aim or move, strategy is everything. Survive, score points, unlock new cards, characters and planets. 🔥
